body:
That worked. Thank you so much. I set `NO_DISTRIBUTED` to `1`. But does that mean I won't be able to use distributed support for PyTorch?

`ibv_devinfo` outputs:

`hca_id:	mlx4_0`
	`transport:			InfiniBand (0)`
	`fw_ver:				2.7.626`
	`node_guid:			0002:c903:000c:26ee`
	`sys_image_guid:			0002:c903:000c:26f1`
	`vendor_id:			0x02c9`
	`vendor_part_id:			26428`
	`hw_ver:				0xB0`
	`board_id:			MT_0D90110009`
	`phys_port_cnt:			1`
		`port:	1`
			`state:			PORT_ACTIVE (4)`
			`max_mtu:		4096 (5)`
			`active_mtu:		4096 (5)`
			`sm_lid:			4`
			`port_lid:		48`
			`port_lmc:		0x00`
			`link_layer:		InfiniBand`
